name: Graycing
description:
Dive in the Black & White World of Graycing and enjoy the fun "Minicar" like arcade experience! Master All The Toy Cars!

FEATURES

Play With Your Friends in the Split Screen Two Player Mode.

3 Different Modes, 1.Arcade, 2.Time Trial and 3.Championship - The Ultimate Goal of the game.

Practice in Arcade and Time Trial, to prepare for the championship.

6 Types of Graphics types to enhance the Beautiful World.

12 Different Championships, Beat The Legend Championship to be the best Graycer!

7 Different Tracks with 3 Difficulties to increase the gameplay features.

9 Different Cars to choose from, each with their pros & cons, even the fastest car lacks something.

Master all the stunts of all the races to beat the brainless but brutal A.I.

Time the perfect stunts or else, lose!
